oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Improved method for the prediction of resonance frequency of triangular microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAY, KP
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: patch antenna
formula
equilateral triangular microstrip antenna
resonance frequency
effective dielectric constant
edge extension
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An improved method is presented to predict the resonance frequency of the equilateral triangular microstrip antenna, which takes into account the frequency dependency of the effective dielectric constant and edge extension. The simulated results are in very good agreement with the reported and measured results.
